Definitions

Framework
A framework, or software framework, is a platform for developing software applications. It provides a foundation on which software developers can build programs for a specific platform.

Library
In programming, a library is a collection of precompiled routines that a program can use.

Api (Application Programming Interface)
An application programming interface is a computing interface to a software component or a system, that defines how other components or systems can use it. It defines the kinds of calls or requests that can be made, how to make them, the data formats that should be used.

Google Maps

Owner: Google

Google Maps is a web mapping service developed by Google. It offers satellite imagery, aerial photography, street maps, 360° interactive panoramic views of streets, real-time traffic conditions, and route planning for traveling by foot, car, bicycle and air, or public transportation.

Google Places

Owner: Google

Google Material

Owner: Google

Material Design is a design language that Google developed in 2014. Expanding on the "card" motifs that debuted in Google Now, Material Design uses more grid-based layouts, responsive animations and transitions, padding, and depth effects such as lighting and shadows.

GSON

Owner: Google

Gson is an open-source Java library to serialize and deserialize Java objects to JSON.

Firebase

Owner: Google

Firebase is Google's mobile platform that helps you quickly develop high-quality apps.

The sub modules used from Firebase are

  • Firebase-Auth
  • Firebase-Analytics
  • Firebase-Dynamic-Links
  • Firebase-Database
  • Firebase-Firestore
  • Firebase-Ml-Vision

CreditCardNfcReader

Owner: Pro100svitlo Github

Use for reading payment card details using the device NFC reader

RxJava

Owner: OpenSource Github Source

RxJava is a Java VM implementation of Reactive Extensions: a library for composing asynchronous and event-based programs by using observable sequences.

Retrofit

Owner: Github Open source

Retrofit turns your HTTP API into a Java interface

Commons IO

Owner: Appache

Facebook Login SDK

Owner: Facebook

CodeScanner Zxing

Owner: Open source Zxing Github

A library which allows the user to use their device camera as a barcode scanner

Glide

Owner: Open source BumpTech Github

Glide is a fast and efficient open source media management and image loading framework for Android that wraps media decoding, memory and disk caching, and resource pooling into a simple and easy to use interface.

Tesco Api

Owner: Tesco

  • Tesco Store Search
  • Tesco Grocery Search
  • Tesco Product Search
